alert.note: Alert for Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:59AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Weakley and northwestern Henry Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 858 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palmersville, or 15 miles northwest of Paris, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paris, Cottage Grove, Palmersville, Puryear, Mill Creek, Osage, Whitlock, Jones Mill, Foundry Hill, Porter Court and India. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
